data.name: Are u a Dobby?
data.description:
Hello Dobby!

In certain places DOBBY means frontend developer with excellent skills and qualities. If you are a DOBBY yourself prove it by displaying the name  as an ascii art.

Example:

```
@@@  @@@@ @@@  @@@  @   @
@  @ @  @ @  @ @  @  @ @
@  @ @  @ @ @  @ @    @
@  @ @  @ @  @ @  @   @
@@@  @@@@ @@@  @@@    @
```

You need to implement the draw function according to these specifications:
- first parameter is the character which needs to be used.
- second parameter is the total width of the graphic
- third parameter is the tolal height of the graphic

If the width paramater can't be devided by 25 or height paramater can't be devided by 5 you have to return 'This is not a Dobby!' string.
